item.title: Data Science & ML -using Python
item.description:
My Data Science Repository containing portfolio projects completed for Industry, academic, self learning, and professional purposes. Presented in the form of Jupyter Notebooks.
-Tools; Python: NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib Machine Learning: scikit-learn, TensorFlow, keras

item.title: Data Science & ML -using R
item.description:
My Data Science Repository containing portfolio projects completed for Industry, academic, self learning, and professional purposes. Presented in the form of Jupyter Notebooks.
-Tools; R: tidyverse, dplyr, R Markdown , Shiny, Ggplot2 Machine Learning: RandomForest, caret

item.title: My current research
item.description: As a data scientist, I like to maintain ties to the research community while working in the data science field. This gives me a firm grip & perspective of the technologies I use in my consulting work: It enables me to apply AI & machine learning and contribute to its intellectual discourse.

item.title: Visualization -Tableau
item.description: Beautiful data visualization can have powerful implications for data users experience and ability to uncover deeper insights and drill deeper into their data in order to make better business decisions. This repository contains curated dashboards and visualizations I have created in Tableau.
